item.title: How to merge to graph using same y axis
item.description: In case of that I want to plot several graphs, and the datasets are same and variables are same. How to make it in a compact way, such as I want them share the same y-axis and distinct x-axis, or verse visa. Or I treat X variables in different ways, log and 1/x. I use code from stackexchange.com library("PtProcess") lambda <- 1.5 a <- 1 pareto <- rpareto(1000,lambda=lambda,a=a) x_pareto <- seq(from=min(pareto),to=max(pareto),length=1000) y_pareto <- 1-ppareto(x_pareto,lambda,a) df1 <- data.
